remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 介面，將一組宣告集新增或對應至其他集合。Implement the interface to add or map one set of claims to another. 授權原則會檢查宣告集並根據目前的集合新增額外的宣告。An authorization policy examines a set of claims and adds additional claims based on the current set. 例如，授權原則可能評估含有生日的宣告，及新增判斷提示使用者超過 21 歲的宣告並新增 Over21 宣告至 。For example, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that asserts that the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the . 實作 介面的類別不會授權使用者，不過這些類別會讓 類別來授權使用者。Classes that implement the interface do not authorize users, but they enable the class to do so. 會對每個作用中的授權原則呼叫 方法。The calls the method for each authorization policy in effect. 方法會根據目前內容，決定是否要為使用者新增額外宣告。The method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user, based on the current context. 授權原則的 方法可能會呼叫多次，如同由其他授權原則新增至 的宣告。An authorization policy's method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the by other authorization policies. 當所有作用中的授權原則完成後， 類別會根據最後的宣告集來授權決策。When all authorization policies in effect are done, the class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims. 類別會建立 ，其中包含反映這些授權決策的不可變宣告集。The class then creates an that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions. ## Examples [!code-csharp[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/vb/myauthorizationpolicy.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 實作 介面會預期由不同的執行緒呼叫 方法多次。Implementers of the interface should expect the method to be called multiple times by different threads. 實作 介面可使用 `state` 參數來追蹤呼叫和 方法之間的狀態。Implementers of the interface can use the `state` parameter to track state between calls to the method. 如果在對 方法的指定呼叫中設定狀態物件，則在目前評估流程中相同的物件執行個體會傳遞至對 方法的每個後續呼叫。If a state object is set inside a given call to the method, the same object instance is passed to each and every subsequent call to the method in the current evaluation process. ## Examples [!code-csharp[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/vb/myauthorizationpolicy.vb#2)]
